Najah::

Najah saw PRow's arrival and crept quickly between Prowl and FZ. 
"Don't mind it... Maxi-juck!!!! " screamed the snake and after that 
he spat his acid.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Perndabot/Prowl::
> 
> Perndabot growls, jumping back with a slash down his chest, 
although 
> it wasn't really too much extra damage considering the bad shape he 
> was already in. He lifts both missile launchers, firing a missile 
at 
> the Maximal attacker's legs and one at the chest.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Seeing that Perndabot was taken, Prowl turns in the air.
> 
> "Nevermind, I got Zardus," he says to Arcangel, flying at FZ.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::Epyon::
> > 
> > He soars over the damaged ship, and sees Perndabot heading for a 
> Maximal
> > lady bot.(Iron Raptor)
> > "Epyon, MAXIMIZE!"
> > He transformes to bot mode, dropping to the ground. Beam saber in 
> hand,
> > he slashes at Perndabot.
